audioText: Les étudiants deviendront plus attentifs après ce passage difficile de l'examen final en classe.
question: What will the students become after this difficult passage of the final exam?
options: More confident in their academic abilities
More focused on their career goals
explanation: The correct answer is 'More attentive'. The text states 'Les étudiants deviendront plus attentifs après ce passage difficile de l'examen final en classe' - The students will become more attentive after this difficult passage of the final exam in class. 'Deviendront' is the third-person plural future tense of 'devenir' (to become), and 'passage' means 'passage'.
